text: Susanne Lothar (15 November 1960 - 21 July 2012) was a German actress. She was born in Hamburg to actors Ingrid Andree and Hanns Lothar. She acted mostly in independent movies. She was in The White Ribbon and The Piano Teacher. She also performed on stage. She died in Berlin in July 2012. == Other websites == * Category:1960 births Category:2012 deaths Category:German movie actors Category:German stage actors Category:German television actors Category:Actors from Hamburg
title: Susanne Lothar
